articles.title: Case 3368 Eatoniella Dall, 1876 and EATONIELLIDAE Ponder, 1965 (Mollusca, Gastropoda): proposed conservation

OPINION 2182 (Case 3348) Palamopus E. Hitchcock, 1845 (Ichnotaxa, Reptilia?): conserved
